data.name: Settings_EnableSyntaxCheck_Description
data.value: Enable automatic syntax checking in the code

data.name: Settings_FormatOnPaste_Description
data.value: Automatically format and indent code fragment on paste

data.name: Settings_BracesExpanded_Description
data.value: Place open curly brace on a new line

data.name: Settings_ShowInternalFunctions_Description
data.value: Show internal functions (functions beginning with dot) in the statement completion list

data.name: Settings_ShowTclFunctions_Description
data.value: Show functions from TCL/TK package in the statement completion list

data.name: Settings_CommitOnSpace_Description
data.value: Commit intellisense selection when Space key is pressed

data.name: Settings_SpaceAfterComma_Description
data.value: Insert space after comma in function arguments

data.name: Settings_SpaceAfterKeyword_Description
data.value: Insert space after keyword and before opening brace such as in case of 'if', 'while', 'repeat'

data.name: Error_Microsoft_R_Host_Missing
data.value: Microsoft.R.Host.exe is missing. Please reinstall or repair R Tools for Visual Studio.

data.name: InputIsTooLong
data.value: Input is too long - no more than {0} characters expected.

data.name: Settings_ReplSyntaxCheck_Description
data.value: Turns on or off live code syntax check in R Console window. Syntax check may not work correctly in multi-line statements.

data.name: LoadWorkspaceIntoGlobalEnvironment
data.value: Do you want to load the R data file {0} into the global environment?

data.name: DeleteSelectedHistoryEntries
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove the selected entries from the history?

data.name: DeleteAllHistoryEntries
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove all history entries?

data.name: Settings_CommitOnEnter_Description
data.value: Commit intellisense selection when Enter key is pressed

data.name: Settings_TriggerOnFirstChar_Description
data.value: Show completion list on first character typed. If set to off, completion list can be brought up by invoking Edit > IntelliSense > List Members command (typically Ctrl+J)

data.name: Settings_PartialArgumentNameMatch_Description
data.value: When typing argument name in a function call, signature help shows description for the argument that is the best match

data.name: CranMirrorListRequestCanceled
data.value: Unable to download CRAN mirror list. The request has been canceled.

data.name: Settings_CranMirror_Description
data.value: Default CRAN mirror for package installations

data.name: Error_CannotCollectLogs
data.value: Unable to collect and package logs. Exception: {0}

data.name: CollectingRTVSLogs
data.value: Collecting R Tools for Visual Studio logs

data.name: Settings_ShowWorkspaceSwitchConfirmationDialog
data.value: Show confirmation dialog before switching workspaces

data.name: Settings_ShowWorkspaceSwitchConfirmationDialog_Description
data.value: Show confirmation dialog before switching workspaces

data.name: Settings_LoadRDataOnProjectLoad_Description
data.value: Load workspace from .RData into global environment when project is opened

data.name: Settings_SaveRDataOnProjectUnload_Description
data.value: Save workspace from global environment to .RData when project is closed

data.name: Settings_AlwaysSaveHistory_Description
data.value: Save history to .RHistory file when project is closed, even if workspace isn't saved

data.name: Settings_ClearFilterOnAddHistory_Description
data.value: Reset search filter in history window when new entry is added or .RHistory file is loaded

data.name: Settings_MultilineHistorySelection_Description
data.value: Single click in R history window selects the entire fragment that was sent to R. Up/Down arrows in the R Interactive Window navigate through chunks instead of single lines.

data.name: AttachmentTooLarge1
data.value: Archive with log files exceeds {0} MB. Sending large file as an attachment may not be possible.

data.name: AttachmentTooLarge2
data.value: Please place archived files on a file share and add link to the e-mail. When you click OK, Visual Studio will open TEMP folder in the Windows Explorer.

data.name: AttachmentTooLarge3
data.value: Archived logs are in {0} file that can be found in {1}

data.name: Error_CannotSendFeedback2
data.value: Please compose and send e-mail manually to rtvscore@microsoft.com. If possible, attach {0} file that can be found in {1}.

data.name: Settings_RCommandLineArguments_Description
data.value: Additional arguments to pass to the R session

data.name: Warning_SettingsReset
data.value: This will reset Visual Studio window layout to the Data Scientist profile. If you prefer to save existing Visual Studio settings please use Tools > Import/Export Settings instead to switch profiles. You can also go back to the original VS settings profile via Import/Export Settings. Proceed?

data.name: Settings_HelpBrowser_Description
data.value: Determines if R Tools should always be using external Web browser or try and send R Help pages to the R Help tool window. This setting does not affect F1 Web search.

data.name: Settings_ShowDotPrefixedVariables_Description
data.value: Show variables that have names beginning with "." in Variable Explorer and debugger tool windows.

data.name: OpenCsvAppCommandTooltip
data.value: Open in Microsoft Excel or another app registered for CSV files

data.name: OpenCsvAppCommandAutomationHelpText
data.value: Open {0} variable in Microsoft Excel or another app registered for CSV files

data.name: ShowDetailCommandAutomationHelpText
data.value: Open {0} variable details in separate window

data.name: Settings_TriggerOnTab_Description
data.value: If set to on completion list can be invoked by typing one or more characters and pressing Tab.

data.name: SendMailFallbackMessage
data.value: We will now try to open your email client with a pre-created feedback email. If the email client does not open, please send an email message to rtvsuserfeedback@microsoft.com with the following information:

data.name: OpenRProjMessage
data.value: In order to open RStudio project file as Visual Studio R project please select File | Open Project, locate .rproj file and click Open.

data.name: Warning_UncPath
data.value: The project appears to be on a network share. R Tools for Visual Studio may not work correctly when files are on a remote share.

data.name: SendFrownEmailBody
data.value:
Please briefly describe what you were doing that led to the issue, if applicable:
...
If you have any screenshots demonstrating the issue, please include them as well to help us diagnose it better.
A detailed diagnostic log has been created at {0}, and a Windows Explorer window has been opened for that location with the log file selected. To improve our ability to diagnose the issue, you can attach that file to the email. However, be aware that the log may contain sensitive information, including information about installed packages and their contents, your complete R Interactive command history and outputs, and values of variables in your present and past sessions.
Additional information:
{1}

data.name: ReportIssueBody
data.value:
Please briefly describe what you were doing that led to the issue, if applicable:
...
If you have any screenshots demonstrating the issue, please include them as well to help us diagnose it better.
Additional information:
{0}

data.name: Settings_SurveyNewsCheck_Description
data.value: Specifies how often R Tools should check with the server for news and survey updates.

data.name: Error_CannotOpenCsv
data.value: Unable to open CSV file. Exception: {0}.

data.name: ImportData_EnterUrlTitle
data.value: Import Dataset Into R Session From Web URL

data.name: ImportData_EnterTextFileTitle
data.value: Import Dataset Into R Session From Text File

data.name: ImportData_NRowsError
data.value: NRows value must be integer that is greater than zero.

data.name: Error_UnknownMirror
data.value: '{0}' is not a known CRAN mirror name.

data.name: Warning_DeleteAllVariables
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove all variables?

data.name: Settings_RCodePage_Description
data.value: Default code page in R. Affects conversion of characters from Windows Unicode to R and back. Same as in Sys.setlocale(LC_CTYPE).

data.name: Settings_FormatScope_Description
data.value: Format scope after closing curly brace was typed

data.name: HelpSearchTooltip
data.value: Type text to search for in R Help

data.name: Error_UnableToDownloadRClient
data.value: Unable to download Microsoft R Client. Exception {0}.

data.name: Warning_RStudioKeyboardShortcuts
data.value: Do you want to reset keyboard shortcuts to be compatible with the RStudio where possible?

data.name: Message_RClientIsAlreadySet
data.value: Current R engine is already set to the Microsoft R Client.

data.name: Prompt_RClientNotInstalled
data.value: Microsoft R Client is not installed. Click Yes if you would you like to start installation of the Microsoft R Client now. Please close Visual Studio when the setup application starts and reopen it when Microsoft R Client installation is complete.

data.name: Message_RClientIsAlreadyInstalled
data.value: Microsoft R Client is already installed.

data.name: DownloadingRClientInstaller
data.value: Downloading Microsoft R Client setup application...

data.name: Error_UnableToDownloadRClient_Timeout
data.value: Timeout downloading Microsoft R Client installer executable.

data.name: PleaseRestartVisualStudioAfterRClientSetup
data.value: Microsoft R Client setup is about to start. Please close Visual Studio now and reopen it when setup is complete.

data.name: Prompt_MsRClientJustInstalled
data.value: Visual Studio detected that Microsoft R Client was recently installed. Would you like to start using R from the Microsoft R Client?

data.name: Settings_EvaluateActiveBindings_Description
data.value: Automatically evaluate active bindings and display the resulting value. Warning: when this option is on, inspecting active bindings in Variable Explorer and debugger tool windows may change program state

data.name: Launch_NoStartupFile
data.value: No startup file specified for the startup project. Startup file can be specified in project properties.

data.name: Settings_WebHelpSearchString_Description
data.value: String to append to the F1 Web search query after the search item.

data.name: Settings_WebHelpSearchBrowserType_Description
data.value: Defines if F1 Web search should be using internal Visual Studio Web browser or an external Web browser.

data.name: Settings_HtmlBrowserType_Description
data.value: Defines if HTML pages should be opened in internal Visual Studio browser or in the external Web browser.

data.name: Settings_MarkdownBrowserType_Description
data.value: Defines if generated R Markdown pages should be opened in internal Visual Studio browser or in the external Web browser.

data.name: Error_UnableToSaveSettings
data.value: Unable to write to settings file {0}. Exception: {1}

data.name: SettingsPage_Explanation
data.value: R project settings come from Settings.R or *.Settings.R files that are located inside the project.{0}If there is no settings file, you can add variables and save the page. Default Settings.R will be created for you. You can also add settings file to the project via File | Add New Item.{0}Settings are stored as R code and the file can be sourced before running other modules thus pre-populating environment with the predefined settings.

data.name: SettingsPage_SavePrompt
data.value: The selected settings have changed. Do you want to save the file?

data.name: Launch_SettingsFileDoesNotExist
data.value: The specified settings file does not exist:

data.name: Launch_StartupFileDoesNotExist
data.value: The specified startup file does not exist:

data.name: Error_UnableToReadSqlPublishSettings
data.value: Unable to read SQL publishing settings from {0}. Exception: {1}

data.name: SqlPublishDialog_Title
data.value: R Code to SQL Publishing Options

data.name: SqlPublishDialog_NoSProcFiles
data.value: The selected project does not contain any R Script with SQL files.

data.name: SqlPublishDialog_UnableToBuildDacPac
data.value: Unable to package SQL stored procedure(s). Exception: {0}.

data.name: Error_CannotTransferNoRSession
data.value: Cannot transfer files, no active RSession available. Reason: {0}

data.name: Error_UnableToVerifyFile
data.value: Unable to verify if file exists on remote host. Reason: {0}

data.name: Info_TransferringFilesDone
data.value: Transferring files to remote machine... completed.

data.name: Settings_LogLevel_Description
data.value: Defines what events are logged for diagnostic purposes. None disables logging completely. Minimal enables OS Application log. Normal also creates log file with extended information in the TEMP folder. No private or secure data is recorded. Traffic settings enables recording of complete data exchange in the session, incuding interactive commands and potentially secure or private data.

data.name: SqlPublish_NoSqlToolsVS14
data.value:
This operation requires SQL Data Tools package. Please add SQL Data Tools to the Visual Studio 2015 setup or install SSDT from https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/mt186501.aspx.
You can modify Visual Studio installation in Control Panel -> Uninstall Program -> Right click on Visual Studio 2015 and select Change.

data.name: SqlPublish_NoSqlToolsVS15
data.value: This operation requires SQL Data Tools package. Please add Data Storage and Processing workload to your Visual Studio setup.

data.name: Error_CannotExportToCsv
data.value: This object cannot be exported to CSV for viewing in Excel

data.name: Settings_ShowSaveOnResetConfirmationDialog
data.value: Prompt to save workspace on reset

data.name: Settings_ShowSaveOnResetConfirmationDialog_Description
data.value: Show prompt to save workspace when resetting interactive session

data.name: Settings_SpaceBeforeCurly_Description
data.value: Determines if formatter should be adding space before opening curly brace

data.name: Settings_SpacesAroundEquals_Description
data.value: Determines if formatter should place spaces around equals sign

data.name: Settings_LintEnabled_Description
data.value: Enable or disable coding style checks similar to lintr package.

data.name: Settings_Lint_AssignmentType_Description
data.value: Check that ’<-’ is always used for assignment

data.name: Settings_Lint_CloseCurlySeparateLine_Description
data.value: Check that closing curly braces are always on their own line unless followed by an 'else' statement, comma or closing brace.

data.name: Settings_Lint_DoubleQuotes_Description
data.value: Verify that strings are enclosed only in double quotes.

data.name: Settings_Lint_LineLength_Description
data.value: Flag lines longer than the specified limit

data.name: Settings_Lint_MaxNameLength_Description
data.value: Max variable or object name length

data.name: Settings_Lint_NameLength_Description
data.value: Flag names longer than the specified limit

data.name: Settings_Lint_MultipleDots_Description
data.value: Flag objects names with multiple dots

data.name: Settings_Lint_MultipleStatements_Description
data.value: Verify that there are no multiple statements in the same line

data.name: Settings_Lint_NoSpaceAfterFunctionName_Description
data.value: Verify that there is no space after the function name.

data.name: Settings_Lint_NoTabs_Description
data.value: Verify there are no tabs in the file

data.name: Settings_Lint_OpenCurlyPosition_Description
data.value: Check that open curly brace is not on its own line and is followed by a new line.

data.name: Settings_Lint_SpaceBeforeOpenBrace_Description
data.value: Check that left brace has a space before it unless it is a function call.

data.name: Settings_Lint_SpacesAroundComma_Description
data.value: Checks that commas have space after and no space before them unless followed by another comma or by a closing brace

data.name: Settings_Lint_SpacesAroundOperators_Description
data.value: Checks that infix operators are surrounded by spaces

data.name: Settings_Lint_SpacesInsideParenthesis_Description
data.value: There should be no space after (, [ or [[ and no space before ), ] or ]] unless ] or ]] is preceded by a comma as in x[1, ]

data.name: Settings_Lint_TrailingBlankLines_Description
data.value: Verify there is no trailing blank lines in the file.

data.name: Settings_Lint_TrailingWhitespace_Description
data.value: Check there is no trailing whitespace in lines.

data.name: Settings_Markdown_AutomaticSync_Description
data.value: Automatically update preview when markdown file changes

data.name: Settings_Markdown_EnablePreview_Description
data.value: Enables or disables preview of resulting HTML in a browser pane

data.name: Settings_Markdown_PreviewPosition_Description
data.value: Defines where HTML preview pane appears

data.name: Settings_ShowHostLoadMeter_Description
data.value: Controls visibility of the CPU/Memory/Network load indicator in the status bar. The indicator incurs network traffic and can be swiitched off in remote metered scenarios. Requires restart of the Visual Studio.

data.name: Settings_Settings_SmartIndentByArgument_Description
data.value: In smart indent mode align caret by the first function argument

data.name: Settings_BreakMultipleStatements_Description
data.value: When there multiple statements on the same line, break them into separate lines.

data.name: Settings_Markdown_ScrollEditorWithPreview_Description
data.value: When preview pane scrolls the editor scrolls text pane to match the preview pane scroll position.

data.name: Settings_Markdown_ScrollPreviewWithEditor_Description
data.value: When caret moves in the text pane the editor scrolls preview pane to make sure current text line is visible.

data.name: Settings_GridView_DynamicEvaluation_Description
data.value: By default View(x) takes snapshot of data as a data frame. This may consume subtantial amount of memory with large data sets. With dynamic evaluation the expression is evaluated every time grid refreshes in order to only fetch part of the data for display. However, if the variable changes the data in the grid will also change. This mode may be unsuitable for dplyr pipe expressions.
